ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_01_10:
I always end up buying
things for my Pokémon...
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_02_10:
There’s just so many things
I can buy, I can never 
make up my mind.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_01_10:
Have you been to the shop in the
Pokémon Center yet?
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_02_10:
Their selection is really good, so I end up buying
a lot!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_03_10:
I always take a peek when I’m at the
Pokémon Center. Shopping is the best, isn’t it?
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_01_10: I’m buying supplies for my Pokémon!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_02_10: Fortune favors the prepared, after all!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_01_10:
How is this possible?
I chose the perfect pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_02_10: The perfectly cool pair of swim trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_03_10:
I spent all day trying all my trunks on to
finally choose this pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_04_10:
So how is this possible?
I’m the exact same as all the other swimmers!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_05_10:
Everybody has the exact same pair of my
perfect trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_01_10:
No, wait.
All of us have an undying love for the ocean.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_02_10:
So of course we’d have the same clothing taste!
We are all siblings of the sea!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_01_10:
You have to warm up before going into
the water. That’s basic.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_02_10:
Once you have the basics down,
next comes application!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_03_10:
Float on the water and relax! Pretend you’re a
Tentacool, and let the water refresh you!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_01_10:
Once you’re recovered, give it your all like
a Basculin!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_02_10:
*pant pant* I’m beat!
That’s enough image training for today!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_01_10: I want to be that free.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_02_10:
But I’m too conscious of
other people.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_01_10:
Do you feel that wind, too?
Doesn’t it embrace your whole body?
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_02_10:
He’s so dreamy...
I wish I could live as freely as he did.
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_03_10:
You only live once!
And I’m going to live free, just as a
swimmer should!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_04_10:
I worry too much about my parents’ expectations
and how others see me...
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_05_10:
The only thing you have to worry about is
whether you’re living true to yourself!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_06_10:
I decided!
I’m going to become a swimmer, too!
ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_07_10:
I want my life to be something that I can proudly
call my own!
ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0101_01_10:
I am good at breaststroke, freestyle,
butterfly...and, of course, Pokémon battles!
ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0501_01_10:
Did I just lose a Pokémon battle, even though
I’m so good at them?
ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_01_10:
Wow, you’re strong! I even trained with
backstroke and diving!
ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_02_10:
Fine, I’ll swim with a Wailmer on my back
from now on for training.
